justification: B highly values young, ascending dual-threat QBs and already has two Tier 1 options; trading Jake Green for a Tier 4 QB plus a Tier 4 WR in a low-volume offense ignores B’s preferences and surplus. A also asks for an injured WR despite A’s injury-averse profile. The offer doesn’t address B’s likely needs (premium WR/RB upgrade) and overestimates acceptance. Rationale is generic and unsupported.
